name: Outdoor Research Helium Bivy
description: A minimalist shelter for fast-and-light adventures, the Helium Bivy is made of lightweight waterproof-breathable fabric that brings the weight down to just 476g. Leave the optional hooped pole behind, and your shelter weighs a scary-light 418g. The clamshell design opens up wide, and if you're sleeping out at lower elevations in warm temperatures, removable no-see-um mesh allows you to add ventilation.Upper fabric is 2.5-layer Pertex Shield with a lightweight 30-denier ripstop nylon face fabric.Floor is tough 40-denier nylon with a TPU lamination for excellent waterproofness.Fully seam taped and completely waterproof-breathable.2 stake loops and 1 guy-line loop.High-volume toe allows you to store your boots and gear.Removable no-see-um netting at opening.Single shock-cord Delrin pole.
